scripts.docker-start: npx prisma db push && npx node dist/api/startServer.js
scripts.docker-db-init: docker exec -it prisma-postgres-api sh -c "npx prisma db seed" && docker exec -it busbud-postgres bash -c "psql -U user -d mydb -c 'CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pg_trgm;'"
scripts.docker-test: docker exec -it prisma-postgres-api sh -c "npx mocha test/suggestions.js"
scripts.gcp-seed: npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed && npx node dist/api/startServer.js
